labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/361

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce this leftover.
@planet0 Could you please add this rule:
```adblock
scrolller.com##.vertical-view__ad
```
to user rules and then check if this leftover is hidden?

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://editor.wix.com/html/editor/web/renderer/edit/685fb9b3-42c1-45c6-a4eb-3fab80a30357?metaSiteId=6705f948-8ba1-466f-a334-23cc7551b99d](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Feditor.wix.com%2Fhtml%2Feditor%2Fweb%2Frenderer%2Fedit%2F685fb9b3-42c1-45c6-a4eb-3fab80a30357%3FmetaSiteId%3D6705f948-8ba1-466f-a334-23cc7551b99d) ### Comment Username: @KaterynaSergiienko > Hi! :) > > I'm a tech lead with Wix.com QA team, and we have received multiple reports from our users about some functionality of our platform not working when your ad blocking tools are enabled. As far as I can see, this affects our site builder regardless of the specific user's site. > > Wix website builder is for registered accounts only, so you won't be able to reproduce using the link in the report. But here's a test account you can use to verify (go to https://www.wix.com and log in): > > login: testing4adguard@gmail.com > PW: testingEditorWithAdguard > > Test site: https://editor.wix.com/html/editor/web/renderer/edit/15694c34-6e74-4550-a694-f82311035628?metaSiteId=c185b54b-9703-4bf7-9d56-a895e52c8747 > > Just open the test site and click the "+" button on the left to see the issue. > > I would greatly appreciate this functionality to not be treated as ads, as it's really not - or any information on what exactly is triggering the block, so we can improve our product and avoid it that way. > > Thank you for your help. > > Regards, > Kathy - QA at Wix ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/M2JWWTc.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/CSNlVGe.png)

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/361

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: www.buzzfeed.com
issue.body:
## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [x] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address https://www.buzzfeed.com/jp/chinatsukobayashi/ohituji-embroidery ### Add your comment and screenshots ``` ! https://www.buzzfeed.com/jp/chinatsukobayashi/ohituji-embroidery ! Ad ! PC buzzfeed.com##div[class^="ad-japan_adJapanLinks__"] ! Mobile buzzfeed.com#?#section > ul[class] > li[class]:has(> div[class^="Ad"]) ! ! Social ! PC buzzfeed.com##div[class^="post_shareBottom__"] buzzfeed.com##div[class^="post_shareTop__"] buzzfeed.com##.js-inline-share-bar ! Mobile buzzfeed.com##div[class^="shareButton__"] ```
screenshot - PC ![](https://i.ibb.co/gdB6MZz/image.png) ![](https://i.ibb.co/FWqyYYq/image.png)

screenshot - Mobile ![](https://i.ibb.co/VgZFLjn/image.png) ![](https://i.ibb.co/tZcjXmZ/image.png)

### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body: Actually `buzzfeed.com#?#section > ul[class] > li[class]:has(> div[class^="Ad"])` is needed on PC too, tho is almost negligible.

As far as I can see, this affects our site builder regardless of the specific user's site. > > Wix website builder is for registered accounts only, so you won't be able to reproduce using the link in the report. But here's a test account you can use to verify (go to https://www.wix.com and log in): > > login: testing4adguard@gmail.com > PW: testingEditorWithAdguard > > Test site: https://editor.wix.com/html/editor/web/renderer/edit/15694c34-6e74-4550-a694-f82311035628?metaSiteId=c185b54b-9703-4bf7-9d56-a895e52c8747 > > Just open the test site and click the "+" button on the left to see the issue. > > I would greatly appreciate this functionality to not be treated as ads, as it's really not - or any information on what exactly is triggering the block, so we can improve our product and avoid it that way. > > Thank you for your help. > > Regards, > Kathy - QA at Wix ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version uBlock Origin 1.44 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://soundcloud.com/settings/advertising ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Annoyances filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots Consent options are blocked on the SoundCloud settings page. When AdGuard Annoyances list is enabled, a consent options button appears but clicking it does not do anything. When AdGuard Annoyances list is **disabled**, there is no button and the options appear correctly.
Screenshot with AdGuard Annoyances enabled
Screenshot with AdGuard Annoyances disabled
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@Alex-302 

after looking closer, this filter from `cookies_general.txt‎` is causing the ad settings toggle not to show for me:

```adblock
||onetrust.com^$third-party
```

when I add this filter:

```adblock
@@||onetrust.com^$third-party
```

the settings toggle shows for me.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

Версия 4.1.22

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Yandex Browser

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://outdoor.adspace.pro/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Hi! My site is an advertising agency in the city of Krasnodar. I have already applied for domain unblocking before adspace.pro and it was done. Now the site is created on a subdomain outdoor.adspace.pro for the development of outdoor advertising. This name also falls under your filters. I ask you to exclude my site from the filters so that AdGuard users do not have problems viewing my site. I am attaching a screenshot of the problem.
![Новый рисунок](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/113426262/189857173-98ea9af3-3038-4977-bd2e-1e32b5f0e688.jpg)

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://dzen.ru/?yredirect=true](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdzen.ru%2F%3Fyredirect%3Dtrue) ### Comment Username: @NUser2018 > Часть (но не все, во всяком случае пока!) сервисов Яндекса и\или бывших сервисов Яндекса (например, таких как погода, новости и включая даже заглавную страницу, но возможно и некоторые другие сервисы, все не проверял конечно!) переехали с привычного адреса yandex.ru на новый адрес dzen.ru из-за начала сотрудничества Яндекса с VK (бывший Вконтакте) (кстати слухи о передаче\продаже части сервисов Яндекса Яндексом в пользу VK ходили давно и вот теперь они видимо получили и наглядное практическое подтверждение!). В связи с этим на страницах сервисов появились некоторые элементы, (новые и\или которые ранее успешно блокировались Adguard) которые мешают раздражают и которые хорошо было бы заблокировать. Примеры показаны на скриншоте. Баннер (обозначен цифрой 1 на скриншоте) наверняка новый и был добавлен наверняка как раз в связи с переездом на новый адрес, другой баннер (обозначен цифрой 2 на скриншоте) вообще жутко навязчивый и мешает поскольку вообще не имеет привычного крестика\кнопки для его закрытия (правда этот баннер пропадает сам по мере прокрутки содержимого страницы вниз, но всё-равно он жутко навязчивый и мешает, если есть возможность то лучше бы его конечно наверное заблокировать). Вообщем на самом деле наверное требуется довольно глубокий анализ сервисов Яндекса (особенно переехавших на новый адрес) и чистка от всей появившейся в связи с этим возможной рекламы и\или иных мешающих и раздражающих элементов. И возможно не обычными фильтрами Adguard а Adguard Extra. Ну тут уж соответсвующим специалистам из команды Adguard будет виднее конечно. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/IjORi9E.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.10.2 Browser: | Firefox AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.google/dns-query`
filters: `User+rules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.44.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://mail.yahoo.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, EasyList, Fanboy's Annoyances, Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
loading yahoo mail with no filters enabled works fine. whenever i enable adguard base, yahoo mail winds up with emails looking grey (see screenshot). this happens when scrolling down the page when you try to view old emails. with all other filters enabled, except adguard base, page loads normally. I'm using ublock origin on the latest chrome browser running windows 10 
2. Screenshots
with adguard base enabled. 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3977205/190247647-319f479a-4e2c-42d2-b263-6d4a7100d399.png)


with adguard base disabled

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

</details>

Проблема появилась в августе , после вашего глобального обновление . Забегу вперёд всё везде включено и в настройках блокировки и в самом Safari и в приложении ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/cF29O84.png)

comment.body: Добрый день, мы не блокируем капчу и никогда не блокировали. Её просто включили разработчики сайта.

issue.title: app.prismdrive.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://app.prismdrive.com/drive](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.prismdrive.com%2Fdrive) ### Comment > Après plusieurs tests, je constate que dés lors que j'active le filtrage Https, le chargement du script initial qui affiche l'espace dont je dispose sur leur Cloud ne fonctionne pas, il n'aboutit pas. J'ai constaté également que le site Deepl ne fonctionnait plus, la traduction ne s'affiche pas . ### Screenshots
